column2: Section 294 (3) of the Penal Code states for the constitution of the
offence of murder there must be material and  media which  would enable

column1: the judge to hold that in the ordinary course of nature the injuries inflicted
were sufficient to cause death as opposed to mere likelihood. The Judicial

column2: Medical  Officer has testified  that the  injuries  (page  122 of the  brief)  are
the  ordinary  course  of  nature  to  cause  the  death  of  the

column1: deceased.  The  learned  trial  judge  has  evaluated  the  evidence  placed
